Author: Hermes#6934
Content: The dev team took a decision based in the issues that users have been experiencing with DNR

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: We are dropping support of Denarius (DNR) in Agama wallet and BarterDEX due to their electrum (SPV) servers are outdated most of the time which doesn't allow users to use DNR in Agama and BarterDEX properly. Anyone using DNR please contact the DNR team for any further support on that coin.

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: You still have access to your private keys using lite mode version of Agama

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: https://support.komodoplatform.com/solution/articles/29000024493-how-to-use-agama-lite-mode-and-export-wifkey/en

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Here is a quick guide on how to get your private keys.

Author: agnewpickens#7393
Content: Thx, will bookmark that and try it later, need a nap, old man syndrome.

Author: agnewpickens#7393
Content: Do I only get the one WIF key for all my coins?

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: No , for each set of coins you have a WIF, for Komodo Assetchains it remains the same because they use the same public address but for other non KMD based assets you need to extract them separately

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: If you see the coins as undefined I will recommend doing a fresh launch of the app.

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: If that still doesn't help I will recommend going to the userdata in %appdata%Barterdex and erase the coins.json file and restarting the app
